pageContext.claim: “Joe Biden has surrendered his party to the rage-filled socialists, Marxists, and left-wing extremists, and that's what you're gonna have, and you can't let it happen.”
pageContext.analysis: With no evidence, Trump paints a portrait of Biden as an empty vessel, "a puppet," controlled by the "radical left" of his party, as part of a "corrupt bargain." It was always a false construct, perhaps created because Trump had hoped to run against Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.).  Biden is a moderate Democrat with decades of experience and after he was elected his cabinet choices generally reflected that moderation.
